# List of Abbreviations {.unnumbered}

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(gt)
df <- read_xlsx("figure/abbr.xlsx")
colnames(df) <- c("Abbreviation", "Term")
df %>%  arrange(Term) %>% # i.e. alphabetical order by Term
  kable(booktab = T, format = "markdown") # booktab = T gives us a pretty  APA-ish table
  # gt() %>%
  # gt::cols_label(Abbreviation = md("**Abbreviation**"),
  #                Term = md("**Term**"))
```
